body:
The type map[T]bool makes a lovely set type for items of type T. map[T]struct{} is more efficient but a little clumsier to use. Given how easy it is, I see no need for a builtin set type.

This topic has come up many times in the mailing list but there doesn't seem to be a proposal for it, so thanks for doing that.

I will let others weigh in.
